name: Rocky Fujio TAKUSHI, Individually and as Trustee of The Albert G. Takushi Revocable Living Trust Dated April 11, 2007, petitioner, v. BAC HOME LOANS SERVICING, LP.
name_abbreviation: Takushi v. Bac Home Loans Servicing, LP.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Rocky Fujio TAKUSHI, Individually and as Trustee of The Albert G. Takushi Revocable Living Trust Dated April 11, 2007, petitioner,
v.
BAC HOME LOANS SERVICING, LP.

opinions.text: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Jesinoski v. Countrywide Home Loans,574 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 790, 190 L.E.2d 650 (2015).

casebody.head_matter:
Rocky Fujio TAKUSHI, Individually and as Trustee of The Albert G. Takushi Revocable Living Trust Dated April 11, 2007, petitioner,
v.
BAC HOME LOANS SERVICING, LP.
No. 13-884.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 20, 2015.
Opinion
